description: Update many records based on a collection variable
label: Update Many Records

options.name: selectedCollection
options.label: Collection
options.info: The collection you want to update. Note that this collection has a maximum of 200 records.

options.name: mapping
options.label: Value Mapping
options.info: Mapping of values to properties for the updated collection of records. The properties are based on the model from the selected collection.

options.name: result
options.label: Result
options.info: The name of the variable you want for the updated collection.
